name: T-Rex City
description:
Welcome in T-Rex City the most realistic dinosaur simulator. Tyrannosaurus Rex this dino make charge, stomp and eats. You can go everywhere you like and be a horror to this town. Evolve your dinosaur to dominate the world.
Officers will try to stop you by police cars and weapons. Demolish them by using jaws and tail. The military army also knows that you destroy the city. They will be your prey after using powerful skills. Tyrannosaurus Rex can jump and even more. Use roar and stomp that make a wave to prove that you are only one real dinosaur!

All city is for you. Make some noise, show your skill.
How far can you go?

It's T-Rex simulator but you can control other carnivorous dinos like Raptor or Allosaurus.
So it's is one big dinosaur simulator for all Jurassic era fans. Dinosaur in a city, the wild ancient reptile in our times attacks humans. Jurassic predator and prey. Ancient world vs our time. Reptiles vs technology. Who will win this clash?

GAME FEATURES:
- complete task, evolve, be more powerful
- select dinosaur that you want
- realistic city environments like a real world
- a lot of enemies to fight
- awesome 3D graphics and animations

Remember in the game you can control more dinosaurs than Tyrannosaurus Rex. We prepare Velociraptor (Raptor), mighty Allosaurus and many others.
Tyrannosaurus Rex attacking a bus, Velociraptor also known as Raptor, life in city, people as dinosaur prey.

Become city ruler. Begin the next Jurassic era for the world.
Download T-Rex City the Ultimate Dinosaur Simulator!
